title: [Offer Evaluation] Startup vs Current Org Retain
content:
Ex - 4.5 YOE

Current - 
Company: Service Based Org
Title/Level: Data Engineer
Location: Surat (Full remote)
Base Salary: INR 27L
Performance Bonus: INR 5.4L (20% of Base)
Yearly: INR ~32 LPA
Techstack - BigQuery, Cloud Composer, GCP (Redundant work)

Retain Offer - 
Base Salary: INR 31L
Performance Bonus: INR 6.2L (20% of Base)
Yearly: INR ~37 LPA
Techstack - I'll be assigned to a new project, so I'm unsure about the tech stack and use case.

Offer In Hand - 
Company: Enlyft
Title/Level: Software Engineer - Data
Location: Pune
Relocation Bonus: INR 75K 
Base Salary: INR 39L
Performance Bonus: INR 4L
Stock Option: Paper Money, No use  
Yearly: INR ~43L
Techstack - Databricks, Snowflake, Azure
They haven't registered the company in India yet, so it's a contract position under their US subsidiary. Taxes will only apply to 50% of the salary.

I'm considering joining Enlyft because the current project at 66degrees offers limited learning. Though not sure how will be the future assignments if I stay. Enlyft has an appealing tech stack that I want to explore, and they recently hired the head of data from Dream11, which is promising. However, Enlyft is a small, less-established company with only 10-15 employees in India. I could likely secure a position at a better organization in a few months but I'm torn between joining now or staying at 66degrees and preparing for a better opportunity. I'd appreciate your advice as I'm feeling quite uncertain.

title: Arista Network Compensation
content:
Education :- B.tech in CSE from top NIT
yoe :- 3 Year

**Company: Arista Networks**
Title/Level: Sotware Engineer
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: INR 26,00,000 including Retirals (PF + Gratuity)
Relocation / Signing Bonus: 2 Lac
Stock bonus: $20K restricted stock units' grant vested over 4 years
Anniversary bonus (3 lac)


**Current Compensation**
Company: Good EDA
Title/Level: Sotware Engineer
Location: Noida , India
Salary: INR 18,00,000 including  Retirals (PF + Gratuity)
Signing Bonus: 2 Lacs (**i have to returnt since leaving my current company early )**
Bonus: Performance-based bonus (~2 lac)

I tried to negotoate with HR , But she is not ready to negotiate .
**had given Adobe ,Microsoft,Google interview recently ,eleminated due to some mistakes ...**
Is it good choice to join , or give more interviews ?
i feel being low-balled.
